text: @GregAbbott_TX @GovAbbott Dallas County is about to blow past 1,700 confirmed cases. The true number of cases is in all likelihood much higher, since many sick people are not being tested. Hasn’t come close to peaking in TX yet. It’s much too soon to reopen nonessential businesses #StayHome #coronavirus
